name: Terraformers (itch) (MarcoElz, Yissus)
description:
A game made in less than 72  hours for the Global Game Jam 2022.  Topic: Duality

Terraformers is a Tower Defense and  Resource Management game.
Where your progress makes enemies. Energy generation causes contamination which generates the monsters.

It's the Duality between progress and autodestruction.

Generate energy by building Drill towers, which causes contamination.
Fight by using Shooter towers.


Gather dropped resources from fallen monsters.
Repeat. But be careful of the contamination levels.


Upgrade your base.
Build new towers!
Colonize the planet.



If the task is too difficult. Unlock Alien Tech to help you out.



And, don't forget to hear some good music.
